ui
Class ConsumerUI

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      ui.ConsumerUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ConsumerUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.util.Observer

This class creates the Window for Consumer Interface of the Vending Machine.
This window shows the available Food Stocks, Display Screen, Consumer Operations and different Machine h/w Slots.
This window also contains a button which has the link to the Main User Interface of the Vending Machine.
This class also implements Observer interface. This acts as an observer for the observable VendingMachine class.

See Also:

update

public void update(java.util.Observable observable,
                   java.lang.Object obj)
This method contains the definition for the 'update' method of the observer interface. This method updates the Food Stock panel in the user interface window.
